Detailed Description

cvmx_dfm_slot_ctl0

DFM_SLOT_CTL0 = DFM Slot Control0 This register is an assortment of various control fields needed by the memory controller

Notes: HW will update this register if SW has not previously written to it and when any of DFM_RLEVEL_RANKn, DFM_WLEVEL_RANKn, DFM_CONTROL and DFM_MODEREG_PARAMS0 change.Ideally, this register should only be read after DFM has been initialized and DFM_RLEVEL_RANKn, DFM_WLEVEL_RANKn have valid data. R2W_INIT has 1 extra CK cycle built in for odt settling/channel turnaround time.
